entry.title: RT Hart Lambur: yes intents is overhyped. but no one has said out loud how intents can *solve DeFi composability in a multi-chain world* below: my exp...
entry.summary:
RT Hart Lambur yes intents is overhyped. but no one has said out loud how intents can *solve DeFi composability in a multi-chain world* below: my explanation of why intents can do this (+ why arbitrary messaging can't), illustrated with an example from my tardfi past trading US Treasuries 1/n
Georgios Konstantopoulos: NEW post with @0xQuintus from Flashbots! What is an intent? What are they good for? What are their risks? In this post, we seek to unpack this new (or not so new?) exciting transacting paradigm. https://www.paradigm.xyz/2023/06/intents 1/n
